original_text: And as for the king of Judah, who sent you to enquire of the Lord, so shall ye say unto him, Thus saith the Lord God of Israel concerning the words which thou hast heard;
korean_text: 너희를 보내어 여호와께 묻게 한 유다 왕에게는 너희가 이렇게 전하라 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시기를 네가 들은 말을 의논하건대

sentences.original_text: And as for the king of Judah
who sent you to enquire of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희를 보내 주께 묻게 하였으니

sentences.original_text: so shall ye say unto him
Thus saith the Lord God of Israel
concerning the words which thou hast heard
